title: `cargo doc` ICEs on links to unused extern crates

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
`cargo doc` ICEs on the following crate when compiling with `edition = "2018"`: ```rust /// [link](::rand::random) pub fn foo() {} ``` Adding `use rand;` any path in rand (like `use rand::random;`) causes `cargo doc` to succeed.
